meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Karen Griffin Neil Ashar David Menchaca Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6401.

td.p: Karen Griffin, a physician's assistant from Stoughton, Wisconsin
Neil Ashar, an attorney from Washington, D.C.
David Menchaca, a law student originally from Long Beach, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $40,301)

tr.td: AMERICAN ISLANDS
THE HAULS OF CONGRESS
PLAYWRIGHTS
DOUBLE MEANINGS
FLUID SITUATIONS
A HARRISON FORD FIESTA
